title: Endeavour Recognized as a Vendor to Watch in the Latest Gartner Market Trends Report on Rapid Mobile Application Development
text:
Endeavour, specialized in Mobile, Cloud Enablement and Data Analytics, was recognized as a “Vendor to Watch” in the Rapid Mobile Application Development (RMAD) space, in Gartner’s latest Market Trends research report.
Austin, Texas
Endeavour Software Technologies, a global provider of Enterprise Digital Transformation business solutions, specialized in Mobile, Cloud Enablement and Data Analytics, was recognized as a “Vendor to Watch” in the Rapid Mobile Application Development (RMAD) space, in Gartner’s latest Market Trends research report published on 08 September 2015.
The report , titled “Market Trends: The Journey Ahead for Rapid Mobile Application Development”, authored by Gartner Analysts Vishal Tripathi and Richard Marshall talks about the key findings and trends in application development, provides recommendations and best practices for businesses and cites Endeavour’s Common Application Platform (EnCAP), a rapid application development solution framework among industry solutions in the space.
Reacting to the mention in the Gartner Research paper, here’s what Rahul Aggarwal, Managing Director at Endeavour had to say: “At Endeavour, we constantly strive to provide innovative and powerful enterprise digital transformation solutions to our customers. We have been at the forefront of enterprise mobility solutions for over a decade, and we understand this space like the back of our hands. Endeavour’s focus on creating customer-centric solutions has held us in good stead with our customers, and we feel this recognition by Gartner is a testament to that.”
EnCap is Endeavour’s proprietary cross-platform app development mobile framework used to build native apps for smartphones and tablets. The framework enables a single codebase combined with an automatic code generation approach for the development of mobile apps on all leading mobile platforms. It focuses on the grouping of related functionality within an app, into distinct layers that are stacked vertically. It is loosely coupled and explicitly managed. Layering the app appropriately helps to support a strong separation of concerns that, in turn, supports flexibility and maintainability.
About Endeavour:
Endeavour Software Technologies has been on the cutting-edge of delivering Enterprise Digital Transformation solutions to Fortune 500 companies and SMEs spread over 30 countries, since 2002. Endeavour specializes in Mobility, Cloud Enablement and Data Analytics. Our team of 600+ experts helps organizations embrace disruptive technologies, arming them with bespoke solutions that augment their business capabilities. Endeavour is headquartered in Austin (TX), with state-of-the-art global delivery centers in Bangalore, Dallas, London and Singapore.
